info.title: sys-notif-LED
info.author: xc98
info.description: sysmodule to enable the notification LED on boot
info.details:
Sysmodule to enable the notification LED on boot or when new controllers are added.

The mode can be changed in the included overlay:

Solid
Dim
Fade
Off
Dim when charging
Dim when battery bellow 15%, blink when bellow 5%

changelog:
v1.0.1
add text at the bottom of the overlay showing the current mode
fix overlay crashing on fw 21.0.0

Initial release
